item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:4, topic:428195”]You’re missing a ‘)’.

if (p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999)) { [/quote]

thx but still 2 errors =/

Compiling files... .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:1081: illegal start of ex pression if (p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999)) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:1081: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerItems location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player if (p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999)) { ^ 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: 1 Easy line of code, still need help Rep++
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

yo guys, so i made in a 508 server, that u can click items in ur quest tab, and it spawns but it cost money

and i got 1 line of code that give errors, i dont know how to fix this for a 508 so i ask u guys

if (buttonId == 13) {//Dharoks if(p.InBounty == 1) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command in Bounty Hunter"); return; } if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 5000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4716, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4718, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4720, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4722, 1); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You Spawn an Dharok's Set."); } else { if (p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You need 5 Mil to spawn Dharok's Set"); } } break;

I’m talking about this line: if (p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999) {

how can i put that right in a 508 server, cuz it keeps giving errors

Read full topic
